Prusa Face Shield RC3 Modifier

Updating Model

* Layer height is an experimental feature. 0.25 is the only value that we know works.

This tool can add the date, material type and your name to the Prusa Face Shield RC3 3D model.

NOTE Just like the original Prusa stacks, these models are optimised for a 0.25mm (250 micron) layer height. Other layer heights may cause unexpected problems and failure to separate.

Currently only PETG and PLA are recommended for use in the 3DCrowd.UK project

Suggestions or problems? Create an issue on our github page

With much love for Prusa, customiser built by Paul Hayes and Seb Lee-Delisle. Styling by Orangetronic.

Thanks to Netlify for the hosting.
